  • Method Details

    • addRoom

      public void addRoom(int num, String roomNum, String roomType, Boolean wifi, Boolean smoking, Boolean view)
      Creating a room among the 48 rooms, containing details such as room number, room type, Wifi, smoking and view.
      Parameters:
      num - the index of the room number unique to a particular hotel room.
      roomNum - the room number unique to a particular hotel room.
      roomType - the type of hotel room: SINGLE, DOUBLE, DELUXE, VIPSUITE.
      wifi - the availability of a Wifi feature for the hotel room.
      smoking - the allowance of smoking in this hotel room.
      view - the presence or absence of a balcony for the hotel room.

    • displayRooms

      public void displayRooms()
      Displays all the rooms in the hotel by their room number, room type, Wifi, smoking and view.

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom(int roomNum)
      Gets the particular room with its associated room number.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - the index of the room number unique to a particular hotel room.
      Returns:
      the room with its associated room number.

    • printVacantRoomsByType

      public ArrayList<String> printVacantRoomsByType(Room.RoomType rt)
      Displays all the rooms that are vacant, ordered by their room type: SINGLE, DOUBLE, DELUXE, VIPSUITE.
      Parameters:
      rt - the room type of each individual room.
      Returns:
      a list of rooms that are vacant.

    • printVacantRoomWithInfo

      public ArrayList<String> printVacantRoomWithInfo(Room.RoomType rt)
      Displays all the rooms that are vacant and their room details, ordered by their room type: SINGLE, DOUBLE, DELUXE, VIPSUITE. Room details include room number, Wifi, smoking and view.
      Parameters:
      rt - the room type of each individual room.
      Returns:
      a list of rooms that are vacant, with their room details.

    • printVacantRooms

      public void printVacantRooms()
      Displays all the rooms that are vacant, ordered by their room type: SINGLE, DOUBLE, DELUXE, VIPSUITE.

    • printRoomsByStatusMain

      public void printRoomsByStatusMain()
      Displays all the rooms in order of their statuses: VACANT, RESERVED, OCCUPIED, MAINTENANCE.

    • formatRoomNum

      public String formatRoomNum(int roomNum)
      Formatting the given hotel room number into a string.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - the room number stored as an integer.
      Returns:
      a string containing the given hotel room number.

    • deformatRoomNum

      public int deformatRoomNum(String roomNum)
      Formatting the given hotel room number into an integer.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - the room number stored as a string.
      Returns:
      an integer containing the given hotel room number.
